Clement Lenglet: Barcelona Memang Pantas Dikritik!
06 Nov 2019, 17:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bek Barcelona, Clement Lenglet angkat bicara terkait banyaknya kritikan yang menimpa timnya belakangan ini. Lenglet menilai situasi ini wajar karena timnya tidak bermain dengan optimal belakangan ini.
Beberapa minggu terakhir, Barcelona mendapatkan sejumlah hasil yang kurang apik. Salah satunya adalah saat mereka tumbang di kandang Levante dengan skor 3-1 di akhir pekan kemarin.
Tren negatif ini berlanjut dini hari tadi. Menjamu Slavia Praha di Camp Nou, Las Azulgrana tercatat hanya mampu bermain imbang 0-0 meski mereka lebih diunggulkan di laga ini.
Lenglet sendiri mengakui bahwa kritikan yang diterima timnya saat ini memang tidak bisa dihindarkan. "Ya, [Kritikan] itu adalah sesuatu yang normal," ujar Lenglet kepada AS.

Clement Lenglet: Barcelona Deserves Criticism!
Nov 6 2019, 17:40 by Bola.net
Barcelona - Barcelona defender Clement Lenglet speaks up about the many criticisms that have befallen his team lately. Lenglet considers this situation reasonable because his team has not played optimally lately.
The last few weeks, Barcelona get a number of results that are less slick. One of them is when they fell at home to Levante with a score of 3-1 at the weekend.
This negative trend continued early this morning. Entertaining Slavia Prague at Camp Nou, Las Azulgrana was recorded only able to play 0-0 even though they were more favored in this match.
Lenglet himself acknowledged that the criticism received by his team at this time was inevitable. "Yes, [Criticism] is normal," Lenglet told the US.
